meanings.definition: A strong adhesive used for bonding materials together.
meanings.sent1: I used superglue to fix my broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The superglue dried quickly and held the pieces together.
meanings.sent3: My fingers got stuck together with superglue by accident!
meanings.sent4: The superglue acted like a magical bond between the two surfaces.
meanings.sent5: The superglue created an unbreakable connection between the parts.

meanings.definition: To attach or bond with superglue.
meanings.sent1: She carefully superglued the pieces back together.
meanings.sent2: I will superglue the handle onto the mug.
meanings.sent3: He superglued his keys to the table as a prank.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was superglued by shared experiences.
meanings.sent5: The artist superglued the sculpture in place for the exhibition.
